data.what_is:
Reach out and engage with prospects on their preferred channels, including email, SMS, and WhatsApp with Zixflow's Communication platform. Stay in touch with your audience and enhance customer engagement. 

Skyrocket conversions with an SMS campaign and reach your prospects with high open rates and reliable delivery with our AI-powered engine. Send OTPs, updates, or promotions, all in a personalized way. 

Execute email campaigns in no time with our email campaign builder. Use custom domain sender, select the list of recipients, write your message, and that's it!

Engage with millions of prospects on the biggest communication platform - WhatsApp! Send visually appealing broadcasts at scale using WhatsApp Cloud API and reply to all the responses from our centralized Inbox.

Connect Zixflow with your existing infrastructure by using the various integrations to simplify your outreach communications. Use REST APIs to link Zixflow with your preferred platforms and utilize most of our features with ease.

Track analytics, get insights, and analyze the outreach campaign performance across all channels. Monitor the delivery, open, and read rates to get a complete picture of how effective your efforts have been.
